paper: Towards Understanding Feature Learning in Parameter Transfer

differences.summary: Theory–experiment regime mismatch (Condition 4.1 not satisfied by synthetic settings)
differences.why_impacts_score: Undermines empirical validation of theoretical bounds; weakens credibility

evidence.baseline_quote: Synthetic experiments systematically vary N1, σp,1, ∥u∥2, and d, and match theoretical trends.
evidence.final_quote: Apparent mismatch means empirical settings may not satisfy the over-parameterization regime.

differences.summary: Assumption tension: text claims noise correlation while definitions enforce orthogonality
differences.why_impacts_score: Conflicting assumptions reduce methodological consistency and interpretability

evidence.baseline_quote: Orthogonality between signals and noise is assumed; may not hold in practice.
evidence.final_quote: Text claims “noise may have non-trivial correlation” while Definitions enforce orthogonality; unresolved tension.

differences.summary: Undefined Appendix label (“VanillaLG base L12”) causing ambiguity
differences.why_impacts_score: Ambiguous labeling harms clarity and reproducibility

evidence.baseline_quote: Figure 4 shows curves without setup specifics (reproducibility).
evidence.final_quote: Appendix Figure 4 labels “VanillaLG base L12” without definition, making it unclear.

differences.summary: Clarity score lowered with added issues (assumption tension, ambiguous labels)
differences.why_impacts_score: Explicitly cites more clarity problems to justify lower clarity score

evidence.baseline_quote: Clarity (10): 6 — … marred by notational inconsistencies and missing references.
evidence.final_quote: Clarity (10): 5 — … assumption tension … ambiguous labels … figure formatting issues.

differences.summary: Broader loss-notation inconsistency flagged across appendix
differences.why_impacts_score: Signals pervasive notation problems, weakening rigor and traceability

evidence.baseline_quote: Occasional symbol inconsistencies (e.g., L_S vs L_Task2) reduce precision.
evidence.final_quote: Audit loss-notation consistency across the appendix, avoiding undefined L_S/L(W).
